channel.title: Some one ffs
channel.description: will some one throw up a pk server for few days maybe king pk??????????????????????????????????????????????????????// ?

item.title: Some one ffs
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

I think RSCpk day has diminished the effect i was trying to gain.

In order for it to work it had to be the only pking around and seperate from any other server as to not be biased with the number of players it would generate.

Not going through with the test and letting RSCpk day take over in place of my test, would not give an accurate count of the current community still interested in pking servers, as it will be hard to distinguish RSCEs population and the genuine “server hoppers or people in waiting” apart. Which in turn would not encourage the couple devs left in the scene the way it would have.

But continuing with my test would also be ‘tainted’ as anyone still out there could and should prefer to wait for the RSC pk days when they are up, removing any interest to play my test as RSCE is well known, successful and trusted to stay online.

Add to the fact that one of the devs i was banking on has turned to the dark side, im not continuing with this one week test, but rather taking on the end result, releasing a pking server, as i really dont think the other dev left would be convinced enough to commit to getting back to buisness.

While im not really contributing to the development of this pking server in regards to coding and such as i just play games and know what i want in them, ill be supporting array in any way i can (vps/dedi, testing bugs, organising and liasing with the community) to ensure this does not just dissapear into the void where so many other attempts at pking servers seem to go.

The release date of this server is something that will need some patience, it wont run into months but wont be up in weeks either. If you want some real pking, it will be worth the wait.

Move over to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,515787.0.html to keep tabs on the progress.

Read full topic

item.title: Some one ffs
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

if it gets any harder to find the posts that are contributing i will get this thread cleaned.

Update for everyone else, working out the features with array tomorrow, no telling how long before we agree on the end result ( i wont let it drag out for days ) . Currently debating on instant stats and gear vs earning it but much faster, and the details that follow. Once thats done well get to work on releasing, will need a web developer to help with that ( which will take a couple days atleast apparently ), if anyones interested give me a pm.

Read full topic

item.title: Some one ffs

@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

Your both wrong.

The community is shit because it isnt the same community it once was.

RS2lings have become the dominant population and brought thier shit along with them. It is nothing to do with bans or how admins run shit, its the players themselves…end of, both shutup now.

item.title: Some one ffs
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

I dont fully understand that concept.

IlikeArrays:

you cant attack people 5 levels lower than you.

I imagine everyone will pk at flats for the first day or two, then spread out amongst the popular brackets. Attacking players 13 ish lvls higher/lower then you isnt a big as a problem as teaming. Perhaps limit the wild to 1v1s, with the only teaming available is 2v1s to 2v2s max, create a party system that doesnt let other people attack your target if they arent in your team?

IlikeArrays:

Every kill you gain permanent exp

Did you not want to give everyone full exp to pk at wateva lvls they want from the get go, then what would this exp be used for?

Or u didn’t, and this is what you want to use this exp towards? Start everyone off at lvl 5 mages for instance, and work your way up to flats?

IlikeArrays:

and every kill a player drops 5 random items.

If all pking gear is readily available, what random items did you have in mind? vanity items such as chef hats, wiz gear etc that 1 def pbs like to suit up in? Perhaps along with this, you could have a chance of every player killed to drop a random rare?

Could you also keep me posted on ur progress, if possible id like to buy a vps to test whats been done and a domain now with basic forums for anouncements, general and feedback channels.

Read full topic

item.title: Some one ffs
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

How about a mini box… you cant attack people 5 levels lower than you. Every kill you gain permanent exp and every kill a player drops 5 random items. Just like a ffa box or something.

Really we need something to mix things up.

Read full topic

item.title: Some one ffs
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

IlikeArrays:

Yes I am still willing to do it but you did not tell me… When I pk I want to earn something. What am I suppose to get?

Wateva it is you want to earn will just be taken off you after one week when the server is shutdown. If you want to have an economy or item value your more then welcome to create a pking server, ill even help you with ideas…but as it stands there are no developers left that want to pursue pking servers, unless some new guy comes along and is serious about it, we wont be see any pking servers ever.

As ive said, im just trying to gather as many pking server fans as i can, coax them out of hiding to show the couple devs still around there is still a playerbase and hopefully it will re spark thier interest and get them back to creating pking servers ( hopefully one thats well thought out and will stand the test of time ).

If you understand its going to be shutdown after a week, but still want to earn something for kills, why not pk points to spend on rares, sure it can be abused but i really dont see the harm in that given what we are trying to do.

Read full topic
